results.title: Big (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Penny Marshall, James L. Brooks, Robert Greenhut, Gracie Films and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: The wonderfully versatile Tom Hanks stars as Josh Baskin, a 12 year old who is transformed overnight into a 35 year old man when his wish to be ‘big’ comes true. Confused and frightened, Josh runs away to New York, where, by sheer luck, he lands the perfect job in a toy company. Suddenly he’s got freedom, money, toys and all the junk food he can eat. But he’s not prepared for what happens next when a sexy co-worker falls in love with him! Also stars Elizabeth Perkins and Robert Loggia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Penny Marshall, James L. Brooks, Robert Greenhut, Gracie Films and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation

results.title: Daddy long legs (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Jean Negulesco, Samuel G. Engel and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: A remake of the 1931 film, but greatly expanded to allow for the dancing of Fred Astaire and Leslie Caron. The story is that of a French orphan whose schooling is sponsored by an American millionaire, on the stipulation that she will never know who he is. His secretary (Thelma Ritter) is so touched by her letters of gratitude, delivered by the school, that she persuades him to visit. He is then enchanted by the elegant, lovely girl and falls in love with her - and she with him, without knowing who he is. The film contains a wide range of music including a jazz with drums by Astaire, a ballet danced by Caron, several dream sequences with Astaire imagining himself as a playboy and a rich cowboy, and Johnny Mercer’s memorable song ‘Something’s Gotta Give’.

results.title: The Big trail (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Raoul Walsh and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: The Big Trail covers the journey of hundreds of settlers in covered wagons from the Mississippi River to their destiny out west. John Wayne as Breck Coleman leads them through the rugged terrain and falls in love on the way.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Raoul Walsh and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation

results.title: Basic instinct (Captioned) (E)
results.creator_credit: Paul Verhoeven, Alan Marshall, Carolco Pictures and Studio Canal+
results.brief_description: Destined to be a modern classic, Paul Verhoeven’s effort has brought new definition and brilliance to the “femme fatale” of the film noir genre. It is all here, temptation, sex and murder, and all in the guise of a voluptuous beautiful woman. Michael Douglas plays an ex-undercover cop, burnt out and recovering from drug and alcohol addiction when he becomes involved with the investigation of a brutal murder. The prime suspect is a very rich, very beautiful young woman (Sharon Stone) who’s calm and collected exterior belies a predatory and hedonistic soul. Shocking, controversial and explicit, this film is not for the squeamish. Also stars George Dzundza. WARNING - SEXUALLY EXPLICIT.

results.title: Doctor Dolittle (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Richard Fleischer, Arthur P. Jacobs and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: This is a charming fantasy excursion which creates a wonderful world of endless imagination through music, dance and special effects. Rex Harrison stars in the madcap adventures of a 19th century English doctor who walks and talks and squarks with the animals. Based on the stories of Hugh Lofting, the good doctor gets himself into all sorts of funny predicaments in this fun film that earned an Academy Award nomination for Best Picture. With terrific music, fine acting, loveable creatures and a joyous fantasy tale, “Doctor Doolittle” is a classic for young and old alike.

results.title: Die hard (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: John McTiernan, Joel Silver, Lawrence Gordon, Gordon Co, Silver Pictures and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: Bruce Willis stars as New York Detective, John McClane, newly arrived in Los Angeles to spend the Christmas holiday with his estranged wife (Bonnie Bedelia). But as McClane waits for his wife’s office party to break up, terrorists seize control of the building. While terrorists leader Hans Gruber and his savage henchmen round up hostages, McClane slips away unnoticed. Armed with only a service revolver and his own cunning, McClane launches his own one-man war. A crackling action thriller from beginning to end, “Die Hard” explodes with heart-stopping suspense. Also stars Alan Rickman, Alexander Godunov and Bonnie Bedelia. From the novel by Roderick Thorp.

results.title: Blue fin (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Carl Schultz, Hal McElroy and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description: Pascoe expects too much from his son Snook, who always seems to be in trouble. Disaster strikes Blue Fin at sea and young Snook is the only one who can save them. The boat is wrecked and sinking. Pascoe lies injured and the crew swept overboard. Blue Fin is a heart warming story of youth growing to maturity and of human relationships.

results.title: Hello Dolly (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Gene Kelly, Ernest Lehman, Chenault and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: Barbra Streisand is a knockout as Dolly Levi, the woman “who arranges things… like furniture and daffodils and lives”. The plot concerns Dolly, a young widow and professional matchmaker who sets her sights and whatever else she can muster, on conquering tight-fisted Yonkers merchant, Horace Vandergelder, beautifully played by Walter Matthau. How she does it has to be the grandest musical there ever was! So, spend a magical evening with the incomparable Barbra and enjoy a great musicals. Also stars Michael Crawford.

results.title: Home alone (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Chris Columbus, John Hughes and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: This is one of the most successful comedies of the eighties and stars pint-sized hero Macaulay Culkin. In a chaotic frenzy to get to the airport on time, the McCallister family forget one thing - eight year old Kevin. When two bungling burglars attempt to break into the McCallister household, Kevin is left home alone to defend himself and his house. He outwits the burglars by waging war the only way he knows how. A John Hughes film co-starring Joe Pesci, “Home alone” is a modern-day classic.

results.title: Heidi
results.creator_credit: Allan Dwan, Darryl F. Zanuck and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “The Shirley Temple collection”.
Shirley Temple portrays the spirited young heroine of Johanna Spyri’s popular children’s novel giving her rich emotion and infinte charm. When her Aunt tires of caring for her, orphan Heidi is taken to the Swiss mountains to live with her gruff grandfather (Jean Hersholt), a hermit who comes to adore her. However, the Aunt returns to steal Heidi and sells her to a family whose invalid daughter (Marcia Mae Jones) needs a companion. Bullied by an evil governess (Mary Nash), Heidi still charms the entire household and never stops trying to return to her beloved grandfather. Colourised version.
